TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StrongNameKeyPair extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Docs.summary: Encapsulates access to a public or private key pair used to sign strong name assemblies.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to open a Company.keys file (produced by running the [Sn.exe (Strong Name Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) with the **â€“k** switch), read the public key from the file, and display the key in the console window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.permission: for access to unmanaged code. Associated enumeration: .

Docs.summary: Gets the public part of the public key or public key token of the key pair.
Docs.value: An array of type containing the public key or public key token of the key pair.
